moves.name: Fling
moves.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

moves.name: Covet
moves.description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
moves.description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

moves.name: Snore
moves.description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Fling
moves.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.
